title: What is Design Patterns?
content: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software is a software engineering book describing software design patterns. title: Implement Quick Sort Using C-Sharp.
content: Quicksort (sometimes called partition-exchange sort) is an efficient sorting algorithm, serving as a systematic method for placing the elements of an array in order. Developed by Tony Hoare in 1959 and published in 1961, it is still a commonly used algorithm for sorting. When implemented well, it

title: Implement Merge Sort Using C-Sharp
content: In computer science, merge sort (also commonly spelled mergesort) is an efficient, general-purpose, comparison-based sorting algorithm.
